example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS استهل) (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM اعضاء) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاتحاد) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطني)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN لجمعيات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاهلية))))) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC تحرك) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))) (PP-MNR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التجمع)) (NP-LOC (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC امام) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN وزارة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الشؤون) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاجتماعية)))))) (S-ADV (VP (ADJ.VN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC رافعين) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN اللافتات)) (SBAR (WHNP-5 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المطالبة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-5)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الافراج)) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رواتب) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))))))))))))))

arg.g: members of the National Union for Civil Societies
by congregating in front of the ministry of social affairs

example.arg: بالتجمع امام وزارة الشؤون الاجتماعية رافعين

arg.g: holding placards that demand their wages
